attributes.action: demand the BBC to keep Neigbours in its day-time televisual folio
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC are strongly considering expunging 'Neighbours' from its scheduling, purely down to selfish financial reasons. ITV and Channel 5 may then be broadcasting the show, meaning that there will have to be an advertising break half way through each episode, ruining the dynamic and carefully constructed flow of the the programme. If a governemnt intervention or subsidy is required to keep the show on the BBC, then so be it.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
